Review Highlights.Strong SEO Capabilities: e intelligence has consistently demonstrated strong SEO capabilities, helping clients improve search engine rankings, increase organic traffic, and achieve higher visibility. Clients reported significant improvements in keyword rankings and organic impressions.
Review Highlights.Room for Improvement in Content Creation: While generally satisfied, some clients mentioned that there is room for improvement in content creation, particularly in ensuring content aligns perfectly with the client's brand voice and audience.
Review Highlights.Transparency and Honesty: e intelligence's transparency and honesty were appreciated by clients. They felt that the company provided sincere and honest advice, which built trust and confidence in their services.
Review Highlights.Excellent Communication: The communication skills of e intelligence were frequently highlighted as a strength. Clients appreciated their proactive communication, responsiveness, and the detailed explanations provided throughout the projects.
Review Highlights.Highly Recommended by Clients: Many clients highly recommended e intelligence for their digital marketing and web development needs, citing their exceptional service, expertise, and positive results.
Review Highlights.Proficiency in Web Development: e intelligence's proficiency in web development was highly regarded. Clients praised the visually appealing, user-friendly, and SEO-optimized websites created by the team.

solution.qus: Describe the scope of work in detail. Please include a summary of key deliverables.
solution.ans: We had e intelligence complete an audit of our accounts. That audit created the roadmap for us to complete the work needed to improve results. They provided an excellent PowerPoint presentation of the audit findings, which was put together with excellent quality and I was able to show to our CEO, and they provided the supporting Excel docs that our marketers could use to execute.From all the findings, we were able to easily distribute the workload across Victorious, internal staff and our website vendor.

results.qus: What were the measurable outcomes from the project that demonstrate progress or success?
results.ans: Our website was newer, so that's a caveat, but we've seen a 15x improvement in the number of weekly organic impressions. We're ahead of pace with our results, and I'm thrilled about it.

results.qus: Describe their project management. Did they deliver items on time? How did they respond to your needs?

results.qus: What did you find most impressive or unique about this company?
results.ans: I liked the fact that they provided actionable recommendations. They limited the speculation that's often provided by marketing agencies, and they provided a roadmap that we followed, and it paid off tremendously. I also like the fact that they have "flex credits" that can be used on any number of things based on the client's goals (which, in our case, was regularly changing).

results.qus: Are there any areas for improvement or something e intelligence could have done differently?
results.ans: I would have liked to have had a little more time with their technical team. Every time I interacted with them they impressed me.

results.qus: What were the measurable outcomes from the project that demonstrate progress or success?
results.ans: For the most part, when we began our engagement we were starting from ground zero and had to work our way into relevancy. We witnessed significant progress on this front which is why we continue to work with them to this day - the ultimate testament of their demonstrated progress.Keyword Ranking Improvement: Through meticulous keyword research and optimization, they helped us achieve higher rankings for relevant search keywords in our niche, specific to crew socks. As a result, we witnessed a remarkable improvement in our keyword rankings, with several critical keywords securing a place on the first page of search engine results.Conversion Rate Enhancement: The ultimate measure of success for any SEO campaign is its impact on conversions. e-intelligence excelled in this aspect, as we observed a notable increase in our conversion rates. Their strategic optimization efforts, combined with compelling content creation and intuitive user experience improvements, led to a remarkable 35% increase in our website's conversion rate.

background.qus: Please describe your company and your position there.
background.ans: We are a small accommodation property for Australian holiday makers on a very small island in the South Pacific. It is part of Australia and is steeped in early Australian history as well as a very beautiful island. We own and run our own self-contained apartment property.

challenge.qus: For what projects/services did your company hire e intelligence, and what were your goals?
challenge.ans: As part of our recovery from Covid shut downs we needed to boost our SEO rankings and digital presence to make us more visible to the many travellers finally free to travel at least domestically again at the end of 2020 onwards. We had ceased our SEO spend during Covid.

solution.qus: How did you select this vendor and what were the deciding factors?
solution.ans: We had plenty of time to research and decided upon e-intelligence because of their own website rankings, look of their own website as well as suitable pricing.

solution.qus: Describe the scope of work in detail, including the project steps, key deliverables, and campaigns.
solution.ans: This was not a complicated brief. We simply need to rank organically higher than previously, add more keywords, work on back links and anything else to assist with organic growth. They also assisted us with adwords and FB to help with the process. They also instigated a blog which we had not had in place prior to their engagement. Over time they achieved great results and certainly delivered.

solution.qus: How many people from the vendor's team worked with you, and what were their positions?
solution.ans: We had contact with two employees. They were assigned to our job and were both excellent communicators and motivators. They, in turn, co-ordinated various teams in the company to achieve each milestone.

results.qus: Can you share any measurable outcomes of the project or general feedback about the deliverables?
results.ans: We were very satisfied and thrilled with the results.

results.qus: Describe their project management style, including communication tools and timeliness.
results.ans: The company is very focussed on setting goals each month, reporting on each of those goals and any other wins and are very good at tracking information. They were very communicative and always available, should we have needed their clarification or assistance.

results.qus: What did you find most impressive or unique about this company?
results.ans: We were impressed with the dedication to our needs. Even though we were a very small revenue client for them, we were treated as one of their important clients.

results.qus: Are there any areas for improvement or something they could have done differently?
results.ans: The only area where we found improvement could be made was in the blog writing. It was completley understandable as English/conversaton was not their first language. It was a very small issue and we were able to edit these before they were published to make them fit more to our customer base style.

reviewer_info.reviewer_position: E-Commerce Attorney, Of Counsel, Jones & Haley, P.C

review_info.review_quote: I was impressed with how well and efficiently the team managed the entire project.
review_info.review_feedback_summary: e intelligence delivered a responsive, well-designed custom site that matched the client's needs and boosted their business. Organized and efficient, the team exceeded expectations with their great project management and on-time, on-budget delivery. They were professional and supportive throughout.

project_info.project_summary: e intelligence built a website for a legal services firm. They designed and developed a website that featured online contact forms and several calls to action.

background.qus: Please describe your company and your position there.
background.ans: I'm an ecommerce attorney. I represent clients primarily in the areas of (i) legal documents for ecommerce websites, portals and marketplaces, and (ii) online marketing compliance.

challenge.qus: For what projects/services did your company hire e intelligence, and what were your goals?
challenge.ans: I am Of Counsel to a law firm that represents corporate clients; however, the main law firm did not present my services to the level of specification I needed. My challenges: I needed a separate website that addressed the specific services that I provide to ecommerce clients. My challenges: the website needed to appeal to ecommerce companies and entrepreneurs. I engaged e-intelligence for this project.

solution.qus: How did you select this vendor and what were the deciding factors?
solution.ans: I searched for website developers online and found 3 that appeared to be able to offer what I wanted. I was fortunate to have a discussion with the CEO of e-intelligence. He really impressed me with how e-intelligence works closely with their clients and generally regarding pricing, services, and their general approach, and that's what convinced me to engage e-intelligence. It turned out to be a very good decision for me.

solution.qus: Describe the scope of work in detail, including the project steps, key deliverables, and technologies used.
solution.ans: First, we had a kick-off meeting with the Project Coordinator. Based on a discussion of my goals and objectives, he introduced me to the Project Manager who was a great fit for my project. After several discussions with the Project Manager, their team designed and developed the new website that incorporated among other things several calls to action (Book a Call) and online contact forms in strategic places.

solution.qus: How many people from the vendor's team worked with you, and what were their positions?
solution.ans: I don’t know how many team members were involved with my project. Most of my discussions were with the Project Manager who introduced me to specific team members as needed for specific elements of the project. Each of them was very professional, prompt, and helpful. It was very easy and a pleasure to work with the team members.

results.qus: Can you share any measurable outcomes of the project or general feedback about the deliverables?
results.ans: The website is precisely what I wanted. E-intelligence didn’t just produce a template website for me. The site loads very quickly even for mobile users. Several clients have stated that they were impressed with the design. I’m very happy with the result. My law practice has increased substantially as a result.

results.qus: Describe their project management style, including communication tools and timeliness.
results.ans: We had Zoom calls on an as-needed basis with the Project Manager and specific team members for specific elements of the project as needed. At every step of the project the Project Manager advised of the critical path for completion and next steps, particularly for input from me for content for specific elements. Their management style was very organized, prompt, and on time with the critical path. Overall, the project was very professionally and timely managed. Overall, the entire process was smooth and very-well done. It actually exceeded my expectations.

results.qus: What did you find most impressive or unique about this company?
results.ans: I was impressed with how well and efficiently the team managed the entire project. They really knew what they were doing and worked as an efficient team. They were responsive and supporting with my questions and concerns I had during the project. They really cared about my project.

results.qus: Are there any areas for improvement or something they could have done differently?
results.ans: I really can't think of any constructive criticism. I got precisely what I wanted, on-time and on-budget. I'm very happy with the result and the process. I highly recommend e-intelligence.

reviews.title: SEO & PPC for Cleaning Services Co

review_info.review_quote: They do a really good job of keeping in touch and keeping me in the loop.
review_info.review_feedback_summary: e intelligence's work helped the client reach the top of online searches. e intelligence's team was organized, knowledgeable, and communicative via email and Nightwatch. The client praised the team's proactiveness and availability for communication and to keep them in the loop throughout the process.

project_info.project_summary: A cleaning services company hired e intelligence for SEO and PPC. The team set up SEO and Google Ads PPC campaigns, which included keyword research.

background.qus: Please describe your company and position.
background.ans: I am the CEO of Cleancorp

background.qus: Describe what your company does in a single sentence.
background.ans: We are a cleaning services provider.

challenge.qus: What specific goals or objectives did you hire e intelligence to accomplish?
challenge.ans: There were two opportunities. One was that we are focusing on getting more clean contracts and we are also trying to dig into the disinfection service for the time being.

solution.qus: How did you find e intelligence?
solution.ans: Online Search Clutch Site

solution.qus: Why did you select e intelligence over others?
solution.ans: Pricing fit our budget Good value for cost Company values aligned

solution.qus: How many teammates from e intelligence were assigned to this project?
solution.ans: 2-5 Employees

solution.qus: Describe the scope of work in detail. Please include a summary of key deliverables.
solution.ans: First, e-intelligence quickly set up a campaign to get us going. They have created an SEO campaign, primarily with keywords, half of that is focused on disinfection, and half of that is focused on janitorial work. In addition to making some content adjustments, they performed both on-site and off-site SEO for the cleaning department. They went through and used Google to run some reports, identifying the areas with extremely high usage. The keywords were then developed around that.

results.qus: What were the measurable outcomes from the project that demonstrate progress or success?
results.ans: In three weeks, the team managed to move us up to the top spot for disinfection. For us, this meant that the two months during which the pandemic's first wave peaked were also the most prosperous of our lives. That had a direct bearing on the SEO work they completed.

results.qus: Describe their project management. Did they deliver items on time? How did they respond to your needs?
results.ans: It has been good and organized. e intelligence has been good with reporting, and they use a platform called Nightwatch, which I really like because it gives me a more granular view of how our site is performing through a daily report. They also do weekly reports and I believe there is also a monthly report. I haven’t had any trouble getting through to Asad if I need to speak with him directly, which has been really helpful at certain times when there have been issues. We use email to communicate.I tried to ask if they could help us with Google Ads, but they only focus on SEO, which I think is a benefit. A lot of times, people try to branch out too much in this space, so it’s been valuable to only do SEO.

results.qus: What was your primary form of communication with e intelligence?
results.ans: Virtual Meeting Email or Messaging App

results.qus: What did you find most impressive or unique about this company?
results.ans: Their communication has been awesome. They do a really good job of keeping in touch and keeping me in the loop, and they’re active when I have requests. Additionally, when the pandemic hit, we needed help because we lost one of our largest clients and unfortunately that was a big percentage of our revenue. We had to cut down on some things and part of that was SEO. Asad just jumped right in and said we would cut down where we needed to and come back up when we needed to.A lot of times people try to get you into contracts and agreements and they’re just not really friendly, so it was refreshing to see this with Asad. The experience has been really good compared to other ones that I had in the past. This is probably the fourth or fifth SEO company we have dealt with, and they seem to be more organized, professional, and proactive than any of the others.

results.qus: Are there any areas for improvement or something e intelligence could have done differently?
results.ans: No, I can’t really think of anything off the top of my head. They just got on Nightwatch, so they are trying to improve. If anything, they could be more granular with where the backlinks are and exact about what they’re working on.

challenge.ans: E-intelligence had to achieve a novel concept of e-marketplace through bidding and transaction closure in a complex world of commercial real estate, they achieved it 100% with their undaunting and never say no attitude, happy to share !!

solution.ans: They are into Web development, SEO whole gamut of services like digital marketing.

reviews.title: Digital Marketing for Diamond Jewelry Business

review_info.review_quote: They have in-depth knowledge of their domain.
review_info.review_feedback_summary: e-intelligence has effectively increased the client's organic search traffic. They've improved the brand's digital positioning and have led successful social media campaigns. They adhere to timelines and demonstrate in-depth industry knowledge. They also show commitment to the project's success.

project_info.project_summary: e-intelligence conducted digital marketing for an Indian diamond jewelry retailer. They managed the client's paid ads, oversaw email marketing efforts, conducted on-page SEO, and led social media campaigns.

background.qus: Please describe your company and your position there.
background.ans: I am Co Founder at Zivar.in. We are into online sales of Real Diamond Jewellery. ZIVAR.in is established by second generation diamantaires with the aim of providing customers “out of the ordinary jewellery” that honours our traditional values along with modern trends to make every single day special for the wearer.

challenge.qus: For what projects/services did your company hire e-intelligence?
challenge.ans: We were looking for Digital Marketing firm who can increase our online sales through effective social media marketing, SEO & PPC

challenge.qus: What were your goals for this project?
challenge.ans: Our goal is to increase our organic reach and improve our online sales along with our brand positioned as reliable and trustworthy online jeweller who provides their customers “out of the ordinary jewellery” that honours traditional values along with modern trends to make every single day special for the wearer.

solution.qus: How did you select this vendor?
solution.ans: We researched online for best in the business digital marketing firms, studied their scope of work & customer reviews. E intelligence matched our requirements and we decided to go ahead with them.

solution.qus: Describe the scope of their work in detail.
solution.ans: Social Media Marketing Search Engine Optimisation Google Ads (PPC) Remarketing on Social Media E mail marketing Web Development

solution.qus: What was the team composition?
solution.ans: I have worked closely with their Busienss Head, Project head & Business Relationship Manager.

results.qus: Can you share any outcomes from the project that demonstrate progress or success?
results.ans: Since we have started working with them we have increased our organic reach and have improved our brand position on web. They have done number of campaigns on social media effectively.

results.qus: How effective was the workflow between your team and theirs?
results.ans: The communication with the Relationship Manager/Project Manager has been smooth throughout. They adhere to timelines and output is delivered well within deadlines.

results.qus: What did you find most impressive about this company?
results.ans: They have in-depth knowledge of their domain. We appreciate their dedication and commitment towards their clients. Also, they have very well experienced team.

results.qus: Are there any areas for improvement?
results.ans: Nothing in particular. So far they have met our expectation and have been continuously improving their performance.
